title: Coffee Meetup Invitation
content:
Hi Jane,

I hope this message finds you well! I'm John Smith, an entrepreneur with a strong background in tech startups. I'm reaching out because I'm looking for a talented software engineer to join my team and co-found my next startup.

I would love to grab a coffee with you to discuss your experiences and explore potential collaboration opportunities. Would you be available this week or next for a meetup?

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best,
John

[John Smith](https://www.johnsmith.com)
+15559876543
